mapper.sql: Customer_department like '%${check}%' or Customer_id like '%${check}%' or Customer_name like '%${check}%' or Customer_tel like '%${check}%' or Customer_addr like '%${check}%' or Customer_liaison like '%${check}%'
mapper.select: select * from crm_customer where Customer_department like '%${check}%' or Customer_id like '%${check}%' or Customer_name like '%${check}%' or Customer_tel like '%${check}%' or Customer_addr like '%${check}%' or Customer_liaison like '%${check}%' limit ${start},${limit}

select count(customer_id) from crm_customer where Customer_id like '%${check}%' or Customer_name like '%${check}%' or Customer_tel like '%${check}%' or Customer_addr like '%${check}%' or Customer_liaison like '%${check}%' or Customer_department like '%${check}%'
mapper.delete: delete from crm_customer where Customer_id in (${customerids})
mapper.update: update crm_customer set Customer_name=#{customer_name}, Customer_liaison=#{customer_liaison}, Customer_tel=#{customer_tel}, Customer_addr=#{customer_addr}, Customer_department=#{customer_department} where Customer_id = #{customer_id}

update crm_customer set Customer_number= Customer_number + 1 ,Customer_user_id=concat(' ',Customer_user_id,#{loginUserID}) ,Customer_user_name=concat(' ',Customer_user_name,(select User_realname from crm_user where User_id = #{loginUserID})) where Customer_id = #{Customer_id}
update crm_customer set Customer_state=0, Customer_user_id='', Customer_user_name='' where Customer_id=#{Customer_id}
